meanings.definition: Inflammation of the skin around a fingernail or toenail.
meanings.sent1: She winced in pain as the perionychia caused redness and swelling around her fingernail.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with perionychia after noticing the inflammation around her toenail.
meanings.sent3: The perionychia decided to throw a party on her finger, inviting redness and swelling as guests.
meanings.sent4: The perionychia was a fiery dragon, breathing inflammation and causing chaos around the nail kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The perionychia was like a tiny storm, swirling redness and swelling around the nail like a fierce wind.

meanings.definition: An infection of the skin around a fingernail or toenail.
meanings.sent1: He had to treat the perionychia with antibiotics to clear the infection around his fingernail.
meanings.sent2: The perionychia infection spread quickly, causing pain and discomfort around the toenail.
meanings.sent3: The perionychia infection was like a sneaky spy, hiding around the nail and causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The perionychia infection was a stubborn enemy, refusing to leave the skin around the nail.
meanings.sent5: The perionychia infection was a pesky mosquito, buzzing around the nail and causing irritation.
